attributes.action: Write off the student loans of public sector workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is understandable that the government should wish to recoup the cost of university education from those working in the private sector and thereby having a high earning potential. Those working in the public sector often earn less than their private sector counterparts, and are using their qualification for the benefit of the public and should therefore be entitled to have their student loan debts written off.
